markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Daemon](/Traits.aspx?ID=213)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 346</row>

A family of fiends spawned on the desolate plane of [Abaddon](/Planes.aspx?ID=12), most daemons are neutral evil. They typically have darkvision and weakness to good damage.
name: Daemon
